inn1.comm: slightly back of length outside off with the angle, Warner pushes it down to mid-off
closer to the off stump, good bounce as usual, hint of inswing and Warner leaves it alone
angled across again from Warner, he pushes it wide of cover point to get off the mark
back of length around the off stump, he hops on his toes and defends on the leg side
132.5kmh, he leans forward to defend the length delivery just outside off
goes shorter outside the off stump, not too short, and Finch defends on the leg side off the back foot
swings it away from Warner's pads outside leg for a wide down the leg side
back of length and swinging towards the leg side again from leg stump, tucked off the pads for a leg bye to fine leg
on length outside off with some outswing, driven with the swing to mid-off
131.3kph, keeps this one straight on the off stump and Finch presents the full face of the bat to defend it
beaten! Finch reaches out for the outswinger that pitched around length outside off and it swung away to beat the outside edge
in the air, but it flies down to third man after a thick outside edge as Finch drove hard at it
one bounce to third man from Warner. It was pretty short and wide, Warner didn't move his feet much and flashed to take the aerial route but it didn't carry all the way to Morkel
length delivery outside the off stump, he defends it back

that's gone high in the air, Tahir is chasing from fine leg but he doesn't get there! Warner pull-swatted the short delivery on the leg stump, didn't time it and a leading edge went pretty high towards backward square leg. Tahir had a lot of time to get under it, but he's not the most athletic fielder in the team
angled away outside off and left alone
short of length this time outside off, Warner defends off the back foot
on length this time wider outside off, he pushes it to cover
goes on the back foot this time to defend the delivery outside off with soft hands and calls for a run immediately
beaten! 132.8kph, it was angled across from jsut around the of stump, Warner looked to drive it down but it held its line a touch maybe to beat the batsman
another edge and he's safe again! He closed the face of the bat too soon for the straighter delivery and a leading edge flew towards gully and to third man for one
moves across a bit to flick the delivery from outside off to midwicket, where Faf dives to his left to stop it
fuller on the off stump, driven firmly down the ground to mid-on
good-length delivery outside the off stump, solid defence from Finch
back of length with the angle outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover point
slightly short of length on the off stump, goes back to defend it back to the bowler
short ball towards the pads, Warner utilises the bounce and pulls it off the hips to fine leg where Tahir dives to his left to keep it to one

loud loud appeal, mainly from Steyn, looks like it was going down leg, oh he's given him! Finch reviews it. The impact was in line as the short of length ball came in sharply from outside off, but it's missing the stumps. Doing too much and going over after he was hit around the knee roll. Third umpire Billy Bowden to on-field umpire Simon Fry during Finch's review of the lbw decision to give him out: "Fair delivery. Let's move on to slow motion. Doesn't look like there's any bat involved. Let's move on â€¦ ball missing leg stump, ball missing leg stump. Change your decision from out to not out."
back of length outside off, Finch cuts and misses this time
brings this one in again, Finch hops on the back foot and tucks it to the leg side for one
straight delivery on length on the off stump, Warner defends it on the leg side
slammed for six! Takes a small step down and lofts the length delivery on the stumps absolutely straight down the ground for a six! What a way to lift your confidence
angled outside the off stump this time, Warner lets it go
touch short of length outside off, Warner taps it off the back foot towards cover point for a quick one. Oh, no ball for overstepping
makes room, Philander pitches it short outside off and finch slap-pulls it to the wide long on boundary for four
outside the off stump now, Finch stays back an defends it
comes down a step, but the ball goes down the leg side past the batsman for a wide
appeal for lbw as Finch moved toward the off stump, he was struck well outside the off stump, in case the ball hit pad before the bat
starts with a short ball angled across from outside leg, Warner tries to slap it on the leg side but misses. Morkel loses his balance in the follow through
pulled for six, it's not a short boundary mind you! It was short outside off, Warner rocked back and pulled it with disdain to the midwicket boundary for a massive six
thick edge flies to third man for one as Warner tried to play it on the leg side and the ball moved away
brings it in sharply from back of length outside off, Finch is happy with a leg bye towards point
short of length on the leg side, tucked straight to midwicket
full on the middle stump, flicked with the wrists past mid-on for two to end the over
pretty wide outside the off stump and moving away further, starts with a wide
comes in closer towards the stump, still wide enough for Finch to leave it
the other side this time - wide down the leg side
right on target now - brings it in sharply towards the stumps, Finch rocks back to defend it on leg
fuller on off and driven nicely and solidly down the ground but Philander runs and dives from mid on to save three runs

in the air again, just clears mid-off! It was pitched up outside off, Warner hardly moved and slammed it flat down the ground towards mid-off, AB dived to his left but it was out of his reach. If AB couldn't catch it, nobody could
pitched up on middle and off stump, solid defence from Warner
slower delivery, at 118.8kph, outside leg tucked off the pads for one to fine leg
tries the yorker, it's a low full toss well outside off and Warner taps it to cover point
short ball on the leg side now, Warner makes room and gets into an awkward position to pull it for one
strays down the leg side, Finch looks to flick and gets a bit of pad as it just beats De Kock for four down the leg side
he middles it this time and gets four more! It was pitched up, Finch saw the length and heaved it to the wide long on boundary

wider outside the off stump, Finch defends it softly towards points and Warner was quick to respond for one. But it was a run out chance, Miller ran in but could not collect the ball, if he had, Warner was in trouble
short ball, down leg and it's another wide as Warner looked to pull
on the pads again, it's pretty full and Warner flicks it in the air to collect two more on the leg side
angled in towards the stumps, Finch leans on the off side and tucks it softly enough behind square on the leg side to come back for two by the time fine leg runs in. Excellent running
leans forward this time and defends the length delivery into the covers
touch fuller outside off, driven firmly a bit wide of mid-off for one
length delivery towards the off stump now, Warner defends it solidly on the off side
touch shorter towards the off stump, he goes back and tucks it to midwicket
goes back in the crease and helps the ball down the fine leg for one
length delivery on the off stump with the angle, pushed to cover
pitches it a touch shorter and gets the extra bounce as Warner takes one hand off the bat while defending to cover point
back of length and closer to the batsman, Warner goes back and turns it to fine leg
back of length on the off side, Finch goes on his toes and whips it to square leg with the wrists for one
makes room for a wild swing, but the ball was shorter than he thought and he missed it completely as it bounced over the bat outside off
length delivery outside off now, pushed towards cover for one
back of length outside off, Warner taps it towards point and Miller dives to his left from backward point, making Warner go back in the crease
short ball on middle and leg, pulled with some power but straight to deep square leg
that's too short and wide, and Finch slams it through the off side in the wide gap off the back foot for four
still pretty short outside off, swishes it past backward point for two more towards third man
slightly slower at 121kph, but it's too full now and Finch launches it down the ground to the long off boundary for six! Mid off was in and he only had to clear that fielder, but he went all the way
good delivery to end the over - brings it in towards the stumps from outside off, no room and he defends it on leg
towards the off stump from back of length, Warner defends it back
outside the off stump on length, driven into the covers for one
taps the back of length delivery outside off, wants the run but decides against it
brings it in a bit from just outside off, Finch defends it on leg off the back foot
appeal for lbw, the length delivery seamed in from outside off and hit Finch above the knee roll in front of the stumps and he was a step outside the crease too. HawkEye says that was going over
towards middle and off stump, tucked on the leg side off the back foot
that's a really poor delivery to start with, or bowl anytime in the match, a really short delivery on the stumps, he went back and pulled it for four
short again, towards off and he cuts it off the back foot on the off side for one
fullish outside off, pushed through the covers but not very firmly and they run very well to take two
slow and short outside off, punched off the back foot to cover point
too full, Warner goes down on a knee and slog-sweeps it for a massive six to the cow corner boundary. He was playing it with the turn and absolutely middled it
wide outside off now, driven firmly wide of long-off for two more
run out chance - taps the ball to cover where Amla runs to get to the ball quickly, has a shy at the stumps but they are too quick

that's a great catch in the deep from McLaren and the stand is broken! Warner pulled the short ball in the air again, McLaren ran to his left from square leg but the ball was dipping on him and he made sure he swooped down with a dive to get his hands under the ball comfortably to complete the catch
slightly back of length outside off, defends it off the back foot

oh another, Philander gets Finch too! He moved the delivery away from Finch from outside off, the batsman pushed at it away from the body and the ball did enough to take an edge for an easy catch for de Kock
132.1kph, straightish delivery outside off on length, Clarke defends it back to Philander
back of length outside the off stump, defended off the back foot towards cover
bit of flight on length outside off, he presses forward to defend it back
pretty flat towards middle and leg, looked like a flipper, he tucked it to backward square leg
goes in the crease and defends the googly on the leg side
length delivery just outside off, leans forward and blocks again
much shorter on the leg stump, Watson goes back and tucks it to midwicket to get off the mark
short and flat on middle and leg, clipped off the pads to backward square leg
back of length outside off and moves it away from the batsman, left alone
shapes it away from outside off again, he shoulders arms
angled in a bit this time, Clarke pushes this one to short midwicket
straight delivery on the off stump, defends it down to mid-on
128kph, slightly back of length delivery on the off stump, Clarke defends again
seams it in a bit from outside off, thick inside edge goes to the leg side for one
low full toss on the pads, driven down the ground to long on for one
nice shape and turn outside off as Watson reaches out to defend it to backward point
flattish outside off and bit of turn, he defends off the back foot
leans froward this time and defends it from length
reaches out and turns the ball down to long for one
turns in the wrong one from outside off, Clarke picks it and defends it on leg
angled in towards the pads, it deflects down leg for a leg bye and it brings up the 100
slightly fuller on the off stump, the wobbled seam takes an inside edge for one on the leg side
strays towards the pads, worked to the leg side for one
bangs in the short ball outside off, Clarke stayed back and defended it uppishly off the top of the bat towards point
140kph, short again outside off, good bounce of course, and Clarke goes on his toes to defend it close to himself
not as short, but short delivery towards middle stump this time, Clarke stays in the crease and defends it on leg
bit of flight and on length on the leg stump, defended towards midwicket
shorter and quicker on the stumps, he goes back to cut and gets his bat down just in time
takes a step down and lofts it in the air, not from the middle of the bat though, towards the covers
strays towards the leg side now and a thin edge goes past the keeper on the leg side
flat towards the leg side again, this time it's played off the pads fine down the leg side to beat fine leg for four
fuller towards the off stump, he blocks it back down the ground
length delivery on the off stump, tucked on the leg side for one
worked to square leg off the back foot as Steyn pitches it shorter
shapes it in towards middle and leg from length, helped down to fine leg for one more

there you go - Steyn gets Clarke's wicket! Steyn banged in a short ball around off, Clarke took a step towards off and pulled but didn't time it properly and the ball ballooned off the glove towards de Kock. You won't see an easier catch than that

what a delivery to welcome a new batsman! Nast short delivery angled towards Bailey's head, he sways out of the line a bit, then takes his eyes off the ball and it deflects off the back for four over the keeper
fullish on the stumps, he defends it back to the bowler
takes a step down and drives the length delivery to long off
flat outside off, he goes back and defends it on off
flighted and full, he pushes it back to the bowler
full around the off stump, driven through the covers for one
slower through the air outside off, he reaches out and defends it on off
back of length outside off, taps it to point off the back foot
slower at 128kph and well outside off, pushed straight to cover
brings it in sharply towards the stumps, Bailey looks to defend but is beaten and takes it on the pads
angled down the leg side and it's worked off the pads to fine leg
driven handsomely through the covers, what a beautiful drive from Watson but Faf runs from mid-off and dives full length to save a few runs

dropped, Miller has put down Bailey at point! It was short outside off with room, Bailey cut it straight to point, Miller goes both his hands to it to his left around the shoulders but the ball popped out immediately
flat and straight on middle stump, defends it off the back foot
turns in the googly from outside off, worked off the back foot towards backward square leg
one more put down! fulld elviery was chipped back to Tahir, he jumped a bit to catch it but couldn't hold on to it. Spilt an easy catch
turns in the googly again, he defends on the leg side
goes on the back foot and defends the flat ball outside off
fuller outside off and it's driven with the turn to the covers for one
short ball outside off, pulls it wide of midwicket for two in the gap to wide long on
short and wide outside off, this time he taps it to point by pointing the bat down
closer to the stumps but still wide enough and he guides it to third man for one
appeal for caught behind as the ball went through the batsman, the bounce made him hop on the back foot and the ball took touched the short maybe on its way

nearly a run out chance! Watson tucked the fuller delivery to short midwicket, AB stopped the ball but he had to throw the ball with his left hand and it merely rolled towards the stumps as Bailey came back
short ball just outside off, Watson plays the ramp shot and guides the ball over the keeper and slip for four
full on the stumps, driven down to long on for one
turn outside off as Watson reaches out for the ball and an edge goes towards backward point
a catch has been taken - finally! Watson swept the full delivery on the pads to short fine leg and Morkel did well to get low and get his hands under the ball just in time
full and flighted outside off, driven down the ground to long off
flighted googly turns in from outside off, he defends it back
flighted on length on the off stump, he leans forward and blocks it again
back of length outside off, he stays on the back foot and defends it
brings in the length delivery towards off stump, drives it down the ground
back of length outside the off stump, he defends it back to the bowler
short ball towards middle and leg, goes on his toes to defend it close to himself
touch short of length outside off, he leans forward and pushes it to cover
short of length outside off, he defends it off the back foot
bit of flight on leg stump, tucked to the leg side but short leg stops it
flatter towards the leg stump again, worked to fine leg for one
slower and wider outside off, it was a googly and he chopped it off the back foot to point
length delivery around off stump, pushed with the turn towards cover
full and outside off, driven firmly to sweeper cover
flighted ad fuller on leg stump, on-driven to deep midwicket for one
pretty full and wide and Marsh leans into it to drive it handsomely though the covers for a beautiful four
drives this one uppishly, it goes in the air but wide of point to deep point for one
length delivery pretty wide outside off, Bailey slices it and Miller does a Jonty with his left hand at point to stop that one
slower delivery at 117kph well outside off, he chased and was beaten by the deceptive pace
length delivery well outside off, driven through the covers for one
angled in towards off stump on length, pushed back to the bowler
well outside the off stump, Bailey taps it towards the slips area for one
fullish outside off, driven with a forward lean to cover

that's gone through, what a delivery from Philander! It pitched outside off and seamed in a bit, Marsh looked to guide it on the off side but left a big gap between bat and pad and the ball sneaked through that to make the bails fly!
outside edge runs down to third man as Wade looked to play the delivery to the leg side
full and outside off, driven straight to short cover
back of length outside the off stump, Bailey defends it off the back foot
angled across outside the off stump, Wade lets it go
length delivery with the angle outside off, guides it to third man for one
swing and a miss! Full and wide, and shaping away as Bailey reaches out to drive but doesn't connect
beaten! This one was closer to the batsman as he poked at the length delivery that came in a touch but not enough to come on to the bat
shaping away a bit this time, big drive outside off and a thick edge flies to third man
back of length outside the off stump, he stays back and defends it on off
back of length towards the stumps, tucked to the leg side for one
fuller on the middle stump, pushed towards mid-on little uppishly
pretty full outside off again, driven through the covers for one
touch back of length and swinging towards leg stump, worked to fine leg for one
back of length outside off and shaping away from the batsman, tapped towards point off the back foot
shot of length towards the stumps, tucked off the back foot to the leg side
short ball angled across outside off, sliced off the back foot to deep point for one
strays down the leg side this time for a wide
angled in towards the batsman just outside off, defends it off the back foot
angled in sharply into the batsman from back of length, tucked to backward square leg
outside the off stump and angled across, tapped on the off side off the back foot
shapes it away from the batsman, it was 118kph and a thick edge went towards the flying slip
towards the stumps from back of length, defends off the back foot
length delivery outside off, pushed down to mid-off
fullish around off stump, pushed to clear short cover and they take one
back of length going outside the off stump, taps it late to short third man for one
cuts it into the batsman from short of length, helped to backward square leg
short of length again, the extra bounce gets an upper edge to third man for one
fuller outside off, turned with the wrists to long on for one
steers the back of length delivery from outside off to sweeper cover
fuller on the stumps, pushed down the ground to long off
offcutter on the leg stump, a thick edge runs down to short third man
shorter and wider outside off, sliced off the back foot past third man to third man
angled in towards middle and leg, he defends it to the leg side
chops the back of length delivery outside off to third man for one
132kph, back of length just outside off, he defends off the back foot
135.6kph, shapes the ball into Bailey, who is left with no room and defends it to leg for one
on the off stump, Wade defends it from back in the crease with soft hands and sets off for a run quickly despite du Plessis' direct hit at the bowler's end
tucks the back of length delivery to the leg side for one more quick single
short and wide, he gets room this time and chops it hard past point for a four, right in the gap to beat third man as well
strays down the leg side for a wide
back of length just outside off and he taps it close to himself
short outside off, slapped off the back foot fiercely before cover point stops it
sharp movement off the pitch from back of length, Bailey adjusts at the last moment to guide it to third man
towards the off stump, Wade runs it to third man off the back foot
what a shot! It was pitched up on the off stump, Bailey drove it straight down the ground over the bowler's head for a cracking four
back of length this time, clipped to the leg side off the back foot
moves across towards the off side, worked to short fine leg for one
full and wide, Wade swishes and gets a run to third man
short outside off and that's been pulled off the back foot to the midwicket area for four. Bailey picked up the length and got on the back foot in time to pull it
on length outside off and it's tapped towards cover point for one

taps the short of length ball outside off softly, sets off for a run quickly and the direct hit from the point fielder running in makes the decision go to the third umpire. He says: "Ok I've made my decision. The decision is not out. Repeat not out. Thank you."
outside off and he defends it off the back foot
length delivery on the stumps, he defends it on off
flighted and full on leg, clipped to midwicket for one
half tracker on the stumps, pulled to deep square leg only for one. It was a very poor delivery
googly turning towards off from middle stump, he defends it late on the off side
fuller outside off, punches a drive to collect one
full and flighted outside off, Bailey blocks it back
googly turning in form length, pushed to mid-on for a quick single
taps the back of length delivery on the off side for a single
takes a step towards the off stump and tucks the ball behind square on the leg side for one
short ball outside off, Bailey pulls and gets a thick edge to clear midwicket. That's the fifty partnership
another run out chance - Wade tapped it to point, Amla got a direct hit but Bailey responded quickly for the call and he made it just in time
towards te leg side and it goes off the pad towards square leg for one
length delivery angled across the batsman, he swishes it on the off side
dropped - that's gone high in the air, Philander is chasing the ball from mid on after Bailey lofted the full delivery. He was running backwards and got hands to it, but it was too tough
length delivery outside off, pushed down to mid-off for a quick single
charges down, McLaren bangs it in short, he pulls but misses. Called a wide because that went over his head
touch short of length outside off, defends it on the off side
this slower delivery goes down the leg side as Bailey looked to pull. Wide called for the width now
angled into the batsman now, pushed to midwicket for one
short and wide, cuts it firmly to backward point where a fumble form Miller gives them a run
back of length towards the of stump, he defends it back
full outside off, Wade swishes it over cover point for one
short ball outside off, clears his front leg and swats it down to the long on boundary for four! He connects those very well
makes room and slap-pulls it down to long on for one
full and wide again, Wade slices it over the infield to deep point for one

short ball, pulled in the air and he's dropped, but it looks like Behardien, who was running in from deep midwicket, has hurt his left shoulder. He dived forward for the catch and got his hands to it, but landed on his left shoulder while falling and he's still lying flat on the ground. Oh he's up, holding his shoulder and is walking off the field with the physio
charges down and taps the full delivery outside off to deep cover and that's his fifty

that's in his zone and it's gone all the way! Pitched up just outside off and he slammed it straight down the ground for a massive six, it landed in the top tier above the sight screen. So a new ball, rather a replacement is required. The TV says it was 104 metres
angled in from back of length, tapped off the back foot towards point for one
slower at 123kph, he opens up for the short ball and pulls it to deep midwicket for one
he doesn't care if mid off is in or deep, he's clobbered that with the angle to the midwicket boundary for a massive six! Made room, got the angle and tonked it!
full on off, driven firmly down the ground and McLaren gets a leg to it
short and wide outside off, left alone and that's a wide
comes down, McLaren bangs it short again, Wade pulls but misses
slower delivery at 119.6kph, it's full, but Bailey has picked it and hammered it down the ground. Will long-on catch that, he tries but that's gone over him

another one goes high in the air, Faf is chasing this time and he's running back a long way from mid-off and completes an outstanding catch over his head, while falling down. It wasn't full but Bailey lofted it again, but couldn't clear the fielder this time
short ball on the leg side, pulled to deep square leg for two
outside off stump on length, tapped to third man for one
pushes the back of length ball to point
fuller on the off stump, he goes back and blocks it
makes room for the flighted ball and heaves it to deep midwicket for one
slightly full on the stumps, pushed down the ground to long on and they come back for two
flighted and full outside off, driven straight to cover
takes a step down, Tahir pitches it short and Maxwell tucks it on the leg side for one
hammered! Wade made room, got a fullish deivery and tonked it over the bowler's head for a four straight down the ground
another boundary! It was full and wide, Maxwell chased and got a thick outside edge for a four to beat third man for four
oh, he tries to reverse slap the full delivery, doesn't connect and even falls down
full this time and it's driven firmly down the ground, long-off cuts it inside the boundary
outside the off stump, Wade makes room to slice the ball from outside off but finds a fielder in the deep, as Rossow ran in from sweeper cover. He's a sub for Behardien
nearly in the block hole outside off, digs it out towards point for one
full and swinging down leg for a wide
keeps a bit low as he stays back and tucks the length delivery on the pads to the leg side

that's gone high in the air towards deep midwicket, but Tahir misjudges it! It was short, he pulled and that should have been taken but Tahir came too much inside and the ball went over him, luckily for SA he stopped the four
short and wide outside off this time, he makes room and slams it over point in the air for four
Steyn pitches it short again, Maxwell makes room again and gets a leading edge over the keeper's head for another four
full and down leg, goes for a wide as Maxwell leaves it
another one goes high, but this one lands safe right in between midwicket and long-on! Maxwell miscued a heave and that went high on the leg side but outside the reach of the two fielders
makes room for a big swing and misses this time! It wasn't a short ball, came in with the angle and just missed the leg stump

that's very clever, four more! He went back and across, the ball was angled towards the stumps and he helped it in the air by lofting it wide of deep fine leg and found the gap between square leg and fine leg
makes room for the short ball, looks to swat it but misses
short ball again and that was nearly taken at point! Johnson tapped the delivery in the air, wanting to clear point but it wasn't going too far. Miller ran towards the boundary and nearly caught it
he makes room for the short ball, lets it go thinking it's a wide but it's not given
they are bowling short again and again, Maxwell wants to pull and misses

it's full this time and it's worked, taken at mid-off! Maxwell made room, got it full and wanted to clear mid-off with a lofted drive but Faf did well to dive forward and to his left for a good low catch. They are checking with the third umpire if it was taken cleanly, it has. And a part of Morkel's heel was marginally inside the crease or it would have been a no ball
short outside off, pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket
short ball around off and he clears midwicket to find the gap in the deep for two on the leg side
short and not too wide outside off, NCN makes room to slap it but misses
another short delivery, another attempt to heave it on leg, another swing and a miss
rocks back and across, expecting the short ball, and pulls it to square leg
makes room, Steyn pitches it on back of length and Johnson punches it off the back foot down the ground for a four! He adjusted very well in the and and found the gap too
makes room one more time, tucks the ball to the leg side as it's pitched up and they take two
the first one goes for four! It was chipped down the ground, Philander chased from mid-off and tried to keep it in with his leg on the slide, but he only deflected it for four
makes room to pull, misses, but they run a bye before anyone realises it
full and outside off, tapped a bit wide of de Kock for another
too short and wide outside off, called a wide
short ball outside off, slap-pulled to deep midwicket for one
one more edge flies away for four! MJ made room for the heave, he did heave but got a thick outside edge and that one flew over the slip are for four
MJ pulls it to deep midwicket, they are running hard and want to come back for the second, they do as Morkel collects and wants to bang the ball on the stumps and misses

inn2.comm: angled across outside the off stump left alone
closer towards the stumps, back of length and Amla defends off the back foot
that one came in fro length outside off, Amla defended, but with in inside edge
fuller outside off, driven uppishly on the off side, point dives to his left and makes Amla go back
length delivery outside the off stump with the angle, left alone
outside off again on length, he defends it solidly
fullish outside the leg stump goes down for a wide
back of length on the leg side, QDK goes back to clip it and the ball lobs off the thigh pad towards square leg
good carry, unsurprisingly, after it pitched outside off and went away, QDK left it
fullish outside off, driven into the covers for one and he's off the mark
angled towards the pads, glanced fine down the leg side for one
length delivery towards the off stump, QDK stays back to defend it on leg with an inside edge
outside the off stump from back of length, pushed off the back foot to third man for one
bangs in the short ball outside leg, Amla was already on the back foot and he pulled it for one
147.7kph, back of length outside off, he defends it off the back foot
fuller outside off, pushed back to the bowler

145kph, edged and that's gone, MJ strikes! It was on back of length outside off, QDK only pushed at it away from the body without any footwork, the ball wasn't close to him and and the outside edge went for an easy catch to the keeper
148.4kph, angles across a length delivery outside off, left alone
short ball at 146kph, it's pulled and goes to midwicket after a bounce
bouncer from Hazlewood down the leg side, called a wide
short of length outside off, pushed off the back foot past point for one
length delivery outside the off stump, he defends it back
back of length outside off, he punches off the back foot and gets a thick edge flying past the slips for two to third man
143kph, good-length delivery outside off, he goes back and blocks it
brings the ball in a bit from outside off, Faf guides it to third man for one
that's been punched off the back foot for four! Back of length outside the off stump, he went back in the crease and found the gap between cover point and point for four
that's too full outside off, Faf drives it with the angle through the covers for three
outside the off stump and he defends it towards cover point

that's an unusual shot from Amla and he's fallen to MJ too! It was slightly back of length and close to off, Amla made room and stayed low to cut it fine, maybe towards third man, but only found a thick outside edge and Wade pouched another catch. Openers back in the pavilion
full and angled across from him well outside off, left alone
beaten by pace, that was 146kph! Back of length and he gets the angle again, the batsman pushes and misses
much closer to the off stump, short of length again, and he defends it off the back foot
142.7kph, bangs it in short outside off, Faf defends it back
nearly another one! That was a beautiful delivery - pitched outside off on length, Faf poked and was beaten because the ball shaped away from him
angled in this time towards the batsman, he tucks it to midwicket
fuller delivery towards the pads, glanced to fine leg for one
short of length just outside the off stump, solid defence off the back foot
length delivery coming in a bit from outside off, driven to mid-off off the front foot
full and wide, Faf drives, but doesn't middle it and it goes to mid off
short ball outside leg, pulled to deep fine leg for one
146.5kmh, bouncer in the line of the stumps, Behardien ducks and sways out of the line
full and wide, too much room and Behardien drives it through the covers. Maxwell ran to the boundary and dived outside the rope to cut the ball in
on length outside the off stump, solid defence from Faf
towards middle and leg, clipped off the pads to fine leg for one
length delivery outside off, it comes in a bit and Faf defends it back
outside off again, punched off the back foot to mid-off
back of length outside off, he goes back punches to mid off again
fuller outside off and that's driven firmly to cover
too full, and it's on the pads, driven beautifully through the on side with a flick of the wrists. Very-well timed for four
outside off, Faf defends off the back foot
fullish on the pads, flicked on the leg side towards deep midwicket for one
back of length outside off, he defends it back
touch fuller outside the off stump, pushed to cover
cuts it in from outside off, Behardien drives it nicely through the covers in the gap for three
length delivery, but it's going towards the pads and Faf is not going to leave that one. Flicks it off the pads to find the midwicket boundary again
back of length outside off and it's left alone
bangs it in short around off, Behardien hops on his toes and defends it
outside the off stump again, punched to cover this time
too short outside off with width and Behardien punches it off the back foot past point after waiting for the ball to come to him and collects four
defends the ball outside off on the back foot
another four! Mid-on wasn't near the edge of the circle, was a bit wide too and Behardien drove the fullish delivery down the ground past a diving Smith at mid-off for four
length delivery outside off, it's pushed to cover
short ball outside off, he taps it down to third man for one
back of length outside off, defended off the back foot
shorter outside off, Behardien guides it off the back foot to third man
tries a yorker on the stumps, clipped to the leg side in the gap for two
stays on the back foot and tucks it to the leg side
goes back in the crease and steers the ball to midwicket for one
length delivery coming into the batsman, clipped to the leg side for two

three down, SA! Short ball outside off, Behardien pulled it but didn't middle it, looked like it took a chunk of the top of the bat and went high towards deep midwicket where Finch ran to his left to pouch it
back of length outside off, he moves towards off and leaves it
short of length and just outside off, AB looks to punch it but doesn't middle it, thick inside edge
closer to the batsman, who goes towards off again and defends it on leg
shortish again, it's a bit too wide again and AB punches it off the back foot between cover point and point for four
145kph, angles across the ball and Faf defends on off
touch wider outside off and Faf taps it towards backward point
wider outside off, it's left alone. But they sneak in a bye after Wade fumbles
outside off on length, AB lets it go to the keeper
nearly another wicket - AB pulled the short ball from just outside off and it went wide of midwicket
fullish on the stumps, driven down firmly and MJ stops it with one hand, his left, and throws it back but wide of the stumps
brings the ball in from outside off, AB chops the ball to third man off the back foot
defends the length delivery from around off to point
drives the length delivery straight down the ground to mid-off
short ball, Faf gets in line and pulls it to deep midwicket for two
takes a step down the ground and smashes it to mid-off
full on off stump, driven down to mid-off again and that's drinks
short of length outside off, turned to midwicket
back of length outside off, taps it to point
fuller on the off stump and he blocks it to point again
charges down for a swing, but he misses as the ball comes in to miss the bat and the leg stump
full on the off stump, digs it down to mid-on
touch shorter outside the off stump, sliced past point towards third man
comes down first ball and whips the incoming delivery bit wide of deep midwicket
back of length outside off, defends it on the off side
punches the short of length delivery from outside off to mid-off
hooked and that just clears fine leg! Short ball was angled in, he took a step down too and got a leading edge, the ball went high and over Marsh who tried with his right hand
not this time, he's caught by the same fielder! Another short ball it was, Faf moved towards the off stump and pulled, but straight to Marsh at fine leg
nearly played himself on! He wanted to leave the delivery that was angled across, but withdrew his bat bit too late and an edge rolled down to keeper
full on the stumps, pushed down the ground to mid-on for a quick single
back of length towards the pads, worked wide of mid-on for one

loud appeal for lbw, he's been given out by the umpire but AB reviews it! The ball came in from off stump to trap him in front of leg stump as it came in, there doesn't seem to be an inside edge. HawkEye says it was missing leg stump, AB survives
full on the stumps, driven down to the bowler who stops it
wider outside off, sliced off the back foot to deep cover
another edge - it flies wide of the slips. Miller was on the back foot to defend it but the ball shaped away and a thick outside edge went to third man
brings the ball in sharply towards the stumps, AB defends it on off
another leading edge off the short ball - AB pulled that short ball half-heartedly while coming down the track and the ball went in the air fine down the leg side, bit far from fine leg
outside off, pushed into the covers by Miller for one
angled in towards the batsman, AB blocks it back
another short ball, it's pulled to deep midwicket for one
length ball outside the off stump, left alone
brings in the ball from outside off, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover
full and wide, that's too wide for Miller and he cashes in by crashing it through the covers for four
short of length outside off, pushed to cover
back of length on middle and off, punched off the back foot to mid-on
touch shorter and angled across, Miller looks to swat the ball on the leg side but the ball goes under his bat
fuller on the pads, flicked to the leg side for one more
fullish outside off, pushed down to mid-off off the front foot
puts his front foot across the off stump and flicks the ball to the leg side for three in the gap
angled into AB now who turns it on the leg side for two
too full, AB punches it down the ground with a straight bat and that beats mid on too
length delivery is pushed down to mid on
makes room by moving to the leg side and swats the short ball to deep point for two. Maxwell runs in the deep and saves two runs with a dive
full on the stumps, driven down to long-on for one
flattish on middle and leg, pushed to the leg side
fuller outside off, punched down to long off
slower and on length outside off, pushed to sweeper cover for one
fullish outside off and that's driven straight to cover
comes down the track and drives it to long off for one
coming in a bit from off stump, AB defends with soft hands towards point and takes a single. An overthrow from Maxwell concedes an overthrow
short ball and that's pulled to deep backward square leg for two more
fullish outside off, punched down the ground to mid off
angled across outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
fullish outside off, pushed down the ground to mid-off
back of length outside off, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover for two in the gap
comes down the track to drive the delivery but takes it on the pad outside leg
works the ball with the turn to the leg side
fullish on the pads, clipped to backward square leg for one
flighted and full on off, driven to cover point by making some room
turning it away from Miller outside off, thick edge goes to short third man for one
turning this one into AB who pushes the ball back to the bowler
welcomed back with a four! Short ball was angling away a bit, Miller stayed in the crease and pulled it handsomely to the midwicket boundary for four
fuller on the pads, flicked to deep square leg for one
outside the off stump, AB defends it on the off side
strays down the leg side past the batsman with a wide
full around off, punched down the ground to mid off for one
that's too wide outside off now and Miller frees his arms with a swing and crashes the ball past point for a four
length ball towards off, pushed towards cove point and he goes back in the crease
short outside off, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover
full on the pads and it's flicked in the gap on the leg side for two
looks to flick the ball off the pads again, but it's shorter now and he doesn't connect this time. Takes it on the pad
angled across the batsman, who drives the ball with the angle to deep cover
short outside off again, punched off the back foot on off again
bangs in the bouncer outside off, he sways out of the line and leaves it
short of length outside off, tucked towards backward square leg for one. They look for the second but decide against it
angled across the batsman, he leans forward and blocks it
towards the pads now, tucked away wide of fine leg for two
back to outside off and it's driven to sweeper cover for one
full on the stumps, punched down the ground to mid-on for a quick single
short ball outside leg, Miller unleashes one of his favourite shots and pulls the ball wide of deep midwicket for four more
outside off on back of length, AB defends off the back foot
outside he off stump, pushed into the covers
he goes back and tucks the ball to the leg side as the ball was angled into him
pitches it on middle and leg, clipped towards midwicket and they take off for a quick single. Throw at the keeper's end means AB has to dive to make his ground
outside off again, steered to deep cover for one easily
outside the off stump on length, Miller puts a foot forward and leaves
flighted on middle stump, pushed down to long on for one
length delivery outside off, he defends on off but inside edge goes to the leg side for one
turning into the batsman, he tucks it to backward square leg
length delivery on the stumps, defends it back to the bowler
short and wide, slapped over the infield in the air towards deep point
flighted around off stump, defends it back to the bowler
in the block hole outside off, he blocks it back
outside the off stump, punched off the back foot to deep point
that's in the air, will he be taken? Miller pulls the short ball, leading edge goes towards fine leg but falls just short of the fielder
outside the off stump, runs it down to third man for one
back of length on the leg side, tucked off the pads to the leg side for one
angled into the batsman, pulled to backward square leg
flighted outside off, driven down the ground to long off for one
tossed up on middle stump, swept against the turn to the leg side
comes down the track and pushes the short ball to long on
goes back in the crease for short of length delivery, works it to leg for one
smacked for six! AB came down the track and heaved the ball with the turn to the midwicket boundary for six! What a way to reach the fifty !
on the stumps and he pushes it down the ground to long on for one more
short of length outside off, punched to deep cover for one
fullish outside off, pushed down to long off for one
back of length outside off, tapped to point
bouncer on the leg stump, Miller pulls but misses
short of length on the pads, clipped straight to midwicket
short ball outside the leg stump, pulled off the back foot to fine leg
length delivery on the stumps, he defends it back
short of length outside off, tucked off the back foot to the leg side for one
bouncer towards the leg side, AB gets ready and ducks under the ball. First bouncer of the over
outside the off stump and it's punched to deep cover for one
fullish outside off, pushed down to mid-off for a quick single
that's the second bouncer of the over as it goes over AB and that's a wide
takes a step down the ground and guides the ball to third man after the bounce. That's drinks
starts with a bouncer that is too high, and is called a wide
what a beauty from Mitch. On a length, just outside off, then moves away from Miller. Beats him. No feet from Miller
closer to off, still some swing away, Miller defends well
full and fast, into the pads, worked away for a single
full and fast, on off, AB goes deep in the crease, square-drives this, gets a single. Not just deep in the crease, it is an exaggerated back and across movement

draws the edge, but it is a soft edge that falls short and wide of first slip. The singles takes Miller to 50, and to 1000 career runs. Watson's dive at slip saves three runs. Watson's stance is at an angle, and he takes half a step as the bowler delivers. Interesting technique
short of a length, holding its line around, AB moves back and across again, and defends
lovely shot. Just a check-drive for a six. He shimmies down the track, takes this on a length, and just lofts it over mid-off. What a clean swing of the arms
short of a length, on off, played with an open face, gets a single
short of a length, well down the leg side, AB pulls, gets a bit of an edge, bit it is well wide of the diving keeper. That makes him the quickest to 7000 ODI runs
appeal for a catch down the leg side as Watson pitches short of a length. He has only kissed the pocket on the way, though
down the wicket, Watson bowls a slower one, which AB drives to mid-on for a single
another slower ball, on a length, on the pads, turned to midwicket
full, outside off, AB goes back and across again, and turns this yorker into a half-volley, driving it past extra cover for three
that's quick, at 145ks, on a length, nipping in a little, hitting the inside edge on the way to his pad
another ripper from Johnson. Cross seam but it swings away from just outside off. Miller in tentative in defence, and is beaten
nicely driven on the up, wide of sweeper-cover, comes back for the second
full, into the pads, sweetly flicked away, past midwicket, and is timed well enough to beat the man in the deep
yorker, just outside off, dug out to cover
guides the ball to third man from just outside off after it pitched on back of length
short ball around the off stump, pulled with a thickish inside edge towards midwicket
little slower and full on the off stump, driven down the ground to mid off
back of length and angled in, AB makes room and punches it to deep point
angled across outside off, punched to cover
full on the stumps, driven down the ground and they get only one as mid-off cuts it

the bowling change as done it, Miller is gone and this strong stand is broken! the length delivery was angled in towards the pads, Miller looked to flick it towards cow corner but played the shot early and even though he looked towards wide long on, the ball went straight to mid on. Marsh takes a few steps back to complete the catch and 126-run stand is broken
bangs in the bouncer at 138.7kph, McLaren ducks under it

stifled appeal for caught behind as it was another bouncer! McLaren took evasive action while trying to defend it as the ball angled in, and Bailey reviews it. The third umpire says: "Looks like it has come off the shoulder, can we zoom in please." Another angle shows there might be a glove, third umpire wants to see the Hotspot and the crowd erupts seeing it on the big screen. Third umpire says there's glove on it, confirmed by Hotspot and he conveys it to the on-field umpire. McLaren gone for a duck
outside the leg stump and it's tucked to the leg side for one off the pad
taps the fullish delivery outside off to third man for one
one more short one, Philander looks to pull but changes his mind
comes down the track and smacks the back of length delivery from outside off in the air, falls short of sweeper cover
here comes another bouncer - coming towards the batsman, he tries to hook but misses
thick outside edge goes towards first slip and falls well short, they even take a single for the fumble
pulls the back of length delivery towards short fine leg where the fielder dives and keeps it to one
beaten! 139kph, outside off, just a touch short of length, Philander pokes and nearly he edged it

pushes outside off again, they all go up for the caught behind appeal, but the umpire says no! Bailey reviews it again! Third umpire first asks for the off side HotSpot. nothing there. Now comes the Snicko, which shows the ball got something when it went past the bat. Third umpire to on-field umpire: there was a bat, reverse your decision to out
gets in line with the ball and pushes it down to mid on
moves towards off stump a bit more, pushes it on the leg side from middle stump for one
bangs in the short ball and it's angled in, Steyn defends it towards point and the shoe of his right foot comes out and is left behind in the crease as he took a step outside
angled in from back of length towards leg stump, helped to fine leg for one
swing and a miss! It was full outside off, AB didn't move much, went for the drive and didn't connect
back of length and coming in, tapped off the back foot towards third man
short of length and straight, slapped absolutely straight down the ground, the umpire falls flat on the ground and avoids the ball which goes for four!
fullish towards the stumps, heaved on the leg side to deep square leg for one
makes some room for the back of length ball outside off, he pokes and misses
angled in towards the stumps now, Steyn defends it back

oh, there's a run out and AB's gone! Steyn defended the short ball on the off side towards point, he took a step out but then said no for the single. It's too late because AB is already halfway down the track, Steven Smith (in for Clarke) runs from point, picks the ball and sends in the underarm throw at the non-striker's end, AB is well outside the crease. Big Blow for SA
fuller on the stumps, pushed down the ground to mid-off and that's the over
hello Morkel, face this short ball, Morkel stays back and defends it uppishly past gully for one
short of length on the stumps, he makes room and guides it to gully
he's expecting the short ball, it is a short ball and Steyn plays the ramp shot, it lands in front of third man and they take one
makes room to slap the short delivery on the off side, the ball angles in and beats the bat
sends in a short ball down the leg side, it's a wide
bangs it in towards middle and leg, Morkel defends off the back foot
fullish outside off, pushed down the ground tentatively
Steyn makes room for the short ball, it is a short ball and goes over his horizontal bat as he pulled
another attempt to pull the short ball, doesn't connect again
full on the stumps, Steyn drives it down the ground, that beats mid-on and even goes for four
one more! Steyn makes room to cut the incoming delivery on the off side, but it comes in too sharply after bouncing and takes a thin outside edge as Wade dives to his left to catch it with both hands
back of length delivery from outside leg, Tahir defends off the back foot
Tahir is moving around, expecting the short ball and it goes over him as he ducks, almost down the leg side. Not given a wide
short ball down the leg side for a wide, good take by Wade down leg
another short one towards leg, tucked to fine leg off the hips for one
back of length delivery angled away, steered to point
137.4kmh, bouncer on the middle stump line, he leaves and it's a wide
length delivery, that's a change, and Tahir pushes it towards point
angled in from outside off, sliced to Maxwell at gully
full on the off stump, pushed to cover off the back foot
short of length outside off, tapped softly nearly the pitch and they take one
angled in from length towards middle and leg, flicked to the leg side for one
short ball outside the off stump, he defends off the back foot
even shorter now, Morkel hooks and a top edge goes over and wide of the keeper for four down the leg side
angled in from outside off towards Morkel who defends it
tucked away wide of fine leg for two, oh they have come back for three by the time Johnson threw it back
full on the stumps and it's lofted down the ground over the bowler's head for four
145kmh, fullish on the stumps, Morkel blocks it back
tries the yorker on the stumps, Morkel blocks again
another attempted yorker goes down leg for a wide
the short delivery is back on the off side, Morkel goes on his toes to defend it near his face
length delivery on the stumps, pushed down the ground through the non-striker's legs, and past mid on for four
short of length outside off, tapped late past a diving gully
length delivery on the off side, Tahir defends on the leg side
short ball to Morkel and he swats it on the leg side off the back foot for four
another short ball, pulled to square leg for one
bouncer for Tahir, he ducks under it
back of length and angled in, Tahir defends off the back foot
bouncer angled in again, Tahir tries to play the ramp shot but doesn't connect
makes room and cuts the ball to third man for one
charges down the track and lofts it to long on for one, falls well short
he turns this one into Morkel who pushes the ball to long on
sweeps the ball that's turning in from outside off, it goes fine and even beats short fine leg for four
fuller on the stumps, tucked to short fine leg
flighted and slower on middle stump, swept to deep backward square leg for one
full outside off, smashed down the ground to long on who takes it after a bounce
length delivery outside the off stump, pushed towards cover
outside off again, punched down the ground to mid off
short ball this time and he pulls it straight to deep midwicket
four more! Back of length outside the off stump, Tahir stays back and crunches it in the gap on the off side for four
and another one - Tahir hooks the short ball and a top edge flies over the keeper's head for four
that's gone high in the air towards point after Tahir lofted the ball from outside off but it falls short again for the fielder who was running in
the last wicket has fallen, he came down the track and lofted the fullish delivery straight down to long-off where Warner took the catch
